title: The Bolshoi Ballet in the Park
creator_contributor_role: Entertainment Corporation Concerts and Arts, production company
subject_group: Music & Performing Arts/Ballets - Film and video adaptations
abstract: Les Sylphides (Chopiniana)--Spartacus Act II--Sleeping beauty (Pas de deux)--La Bayadere (Solar's variation)--Swan lake (Black swan pas de deux)--The Golden age (Adagio)--Spring waters--Don Quixote (Grand pas)
description: This spectacular performance by the artists of the Bolshoi Ballet took place at the Battersea Pavilion, London in 1986 with The Orchestra of London conducted by Alexander Kopylov and artistic direction and choreography by Yuri Grigorovich. The program consisted of: 1. Les Sylphides (Chopin) - Natalia Bessmertnova, Lyudmila Semenyaka, Nina Semizorova, Alexei Fadeyechev. 2. Spartacus Act II (Khachaturian) - Eric Moukhamedov, Natalia Bessmertnova, Alexei Lazaryev, Alla Mikhalchenko. 3. Sleeping beauty (Tchaikovsky) pas de deux - Nina Araniashvili, Leonid Nikonov. 4. La Bayadere (Minkus) solo - Mikhail Tsivin. 5. Swan lake (Tchaikovsky) pas de deux - Nina Semizorova, Alexei Fadeyechev. 6. The Golden age (Shostakovich) - Natalia Bessmertnova, Erik Moukhamedov. 7. Spring waters (Rachmaninov) - Maria Bylova, Leonid Nikonov. Don Quixote (Minkus) - Lyudmila Semenyaka, Yuri Vasyuchenko, Tatiana Bessmertnova, Tatiana Golikova.
